title: 81A.24 SERVICE OF PROCESS; INVESTIGATING POWERS.
text:
By acting as an athlete agent in this state, a nonresident individual appoints the commissioner as the individual's agent for service of process in any civil action in this state related to the individual's acting as an athlete agent in this state.
The commissioner may issue subpoenas for any material that is relevant to the administration of sections 81A.22 to 81A.37 and exercise other enforcement powers available to the commissioner under chapter 45.
